column3: yɛ ntsɛm bɛgye me ae; Yɛ ntsɛm bɔboa me

column2: "Ma hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ mo wu no Hɔn enyi nto na hɔn enyim ngu ase: Ma hɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔn no Nsan hɔn ekyir na wɔndan adapaafo."

column5: no Nsan hɔn ekyir wɔ hɔn enyito ho akatua ntsi."

column2: "Ma hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ wo nyinara ndzi ehurusi na hɔn enyi ngye wɔ wo mu; Na ma hɔn a wɔdɔ wo nkwagye nka daa dɛ

column5: yɛ ntsɛm ma me: Na ɔwo nye mo boafo na me gyefo; EWURADZE
